channel.title: Projects on Phelipe Teles
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Ipeadata Explorer
item.description: A React app to explore and visualize the Ipeadata database.

item.title: URL shortener
item.description: Simple URL shortener made for learning the very basics of Flask and Vue.

item.title: Minesweeper.js
item.description: A Minesweeper implementation that helped me learn the very basics of full-stack web development with JavaScript, CSS, Node.js and PostgreSQL.

item.title: reportforce
item.description: A Python library to get reports from Salesforce through the Analytics REST API.

item.title: mapsbr
item.description: Python library to get geospatial data from the IBGE API or an ArcGIS server directly into a geopandas DataFrame.

item.title: seriesbr
item.description: A Python library to get time series from databases maintained by brazilian institutions, such as BCB, IPEA and IBGE, into a pandas DataFrame.
